pages.text: The $(mob)Behender$() is a flying monster that spawns in $(thing)The End$(). It attacks players, inflicting its target with random negative potion effects. It is resistant to knockback and can teleport when a player comes close to it to attack in melee, similar to an $(l:minecraft_enderman)$(mob)Enderman$(). It is immune to falling damage. When reduced to 50% health or lower, a $(mob)Behender$() will shield itself, protecting it from ranged attacks.
$(mob)Behenders$() drop $(item)Ender Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive random blocks from $(item)The End$().
$(mob)Behenders$() rarely drop $(item)Ender Book$() on death, which is a magical ranged weapon that fires projectiles which inflict $(thing)Blindness$() on hit.
